mapper.select: select id, drawId, incomePrice, createTime from income_statistics
select id, drawId, incomePrice, createTime from income_statistics where drawId = #{arg0} and to_days(createTime) = to_days(now())

select id, drawId, incomePrice, createTime from income_statistics where drawId = #{arg0}
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(createTime)
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(createTime)
order by id asc
